properties.title: Berghotel Schwarenbach
properties.abstract: Acc√®s 2: Leukerbad - Gemmipass en hiver seulement en Seilbahn
properties.description: A historic accommodation directly on the way over the Gemmi Pass, already located on Valais cantonal territory. Private property. Built in 1742. Open both in summer and for some years now in winter. See schwarenbach.ch.
